articles.title: KPA General Staff Warns U.S., S. Korean Forces of "Special Operation"
articles.content:
KPA General Staff Warns U.S., S. Korean Forces of "Special Operation"
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces are busy staging madcap joint military drills for aggression with more than 300,000 troops, U.S. nuclear carrier Carl Vinson and B-1B and other nuclear strategic assets involved.
					 The on-going saber-rattling under the simulated conditions of an actual war assumes more serious nature as its goal is to carry out the "special operation" aimed to eliminate in advance "the person" of the DPRK with "the right to issue an order" and destroy major strategic targets for the purpose of checking the rapid bolstering of nuclear deterrent of the army and people of the DPRK and depriving it of the right to use nukes.
					
					 At least 3,000 U.S. troops or treble those involved last year are taking part in the "special operation" being conducted as part of the rehearsals. They include the Ranger Unit of the 75th Airborne Regiment of the U.S. Army, the Green Berets Special Units Nos. 1 and 19, the 353rd Special Warfare Corps of the Air Force, the 1st, 3rd 5th and 7th teams of the First Special Warfare Corps of the Navy, two battalions of the First Striker Brigade of the 25th Division of the Army, one battalion of the 66th Armored Regiment and the 31st Naval Expedition Corps of the Marines.
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that Navy Seal and Delta Force belonging to the joint special warfare headquarters called "detached force of the White House" are hurled into the "operation" at the direct instruction of the U.S. president.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers do not hide the fact that the scenario of the "special operation" being staged by the ill-famed units is mainly aimed at carrying out the "beheading operation" for "removing the headquarters of the north" and the "preemptive attack" operation for blowing up the nuclear and rocket bases.
					
					 Through a spokesman's warning statement, the General Staff of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on Sunday said that all moves assume more dangerous adventurous nature as they are nothing but last-ditch efforts and final gambling of the U.S. imperialists and the puppet military warmongers who are fated to meet destruction owing to the total bankruptcy of the hostile policy toward the DPRK and the policy of confrontation with the compatriots in the north. And it further said:
					
					 The General Staff of the KPA warns the hideous provocateurs as follows with regard to the situation that has reached an extreme phase which should not be overlooked:
					
					 1. The General Staff declares the KPA's stand to mercilessly smash the enemy's moves with its own style of special operation and preemptive attack, now that the sinister aim of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean war maniacs' "special operation" to hurt the dignity of the DPRK's supreme leadership has become clear and they disclosed even the dangerous attempt at "preemptive attack." 
					
					 They are sadly mistaken if their brigandish "special operation" and "preemptive strike" would work on this land guarded by the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army though they claim they proved successful in other countries and regions. 
					
					 2. They should be mindful that the KPA will deal deadly blows without prior warning any time as long as the operation means and troops of the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces involved in the "special operation" and "preemptive attack" targeting the DPRK remain deployed in and around south Korea.
					
					 The KPA will not remain a passive onlooker to hordes of robbers trying to hurt our people with daggers.
					
					 3. Once the enemy launches the said "operation and strike", they will only bring about a historic event in which the U.S. imperialists will face a miserable doom and the south Korean puppet forces a final ruin.
					
					 It is the centuries-old tragedy that the U.S. and the south Korean forces still don't know how foolish and futile their attempts to hurt the supreme leadership of the DPRK and infringe upon its sovereignty are, though they have stood in standoff with the latter for decades.
					
					 They should think twice about the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by their outrageous military actions.
					
					 The KPA's warning is not hot air.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Abdul Hamid, president of the People's Republic of Bangladesh, on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to strengthen in conformity with common interests and wished the president great success in the work for the happiness and prosperity of the people of Bangladesh.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Greets Bangladeshi PM
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Greets Bangladeshi PM
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Pak Pong Ju Sunday sent a message of greeting to Sheikh Hasina, prime minister of Bangladesh, on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message wished the people of Bangladesh greater development and prosperity in the future.

articles.title: Serbian President Holds U.S., Japan, S. Korea Chiefly Responsible for Aggravating Situation on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Serbian President Holds U.S., Japan, S. Korea Chiefly Responsible for Aggravating Situation on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- Ri Pyong Du, DPRK ambassador to Serbia, presented his credentials to Tomislav Nikolic, president of the Republic of Serbia, on March 21.
					 The Serbian president termed the U.S., Japan and south Korea the mastermind of aggravating the situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Many countries highly appreciate the DPRK's measures for self-defence to protect the sovereignty and right to existence of the country and the nation, he noted.
					
					 He wished the DPRK bigger successes in the economic construction and the work for welfare of its people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Belarus
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Belarus
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- A Belarusian preparatory committee for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Minsk on March 18.
					 L. Shukolinikov, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus and chairman of the Permanent Standing Committee of the Belarus National Association of Friends of Korean People Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Il Sung through media and hold diverse political and cultural events including a celebration meeting on the occasion of his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Benin
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Benin
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Socialist Party of Benin for celebrating the birth anniversary of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung was formed in Cotonou on March 20.
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to give wide publicity through media to the feats of President Kim Il Sung and hold colorful political and cultural events such as celebration meeting, lecture and photo exhibition on the occasion of his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website on March 6 the full text of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution".
					 The work, published on August 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary feats of leader Kim Jong Il and the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and indicates the tasks for successfully accomplishing the cause of the Songun revolution.

articles.title: Sera destruida la "Operacion especial" de EE.UU. y Sudcorea, advierte el EMG de EPC
articles.content:
Sera destruida la "Operacion especial" de EE.UU. y Sudcorea, advierte el EMG de EPC
Pyongyang, 26 de marzo (ACNC) -- Los imperialistas yanquis y los titeres surcoreanos desarrollan freneticamente los ejercicios militares conjuntos movilizando las fuerzas armadas agresivas de mas de 300 mil efectivos y todas las propiedades de estrategia nuclear incluyendo el colectivo de golpe del portaaviones nuclear "Carl Vinson" y "B-1B".
					Estos imprudentes ejercicios de guerra real prestan primera atencion a la ejecucion de la "operacion especial" que tiene como objeto la "eliminacion premia" de nuestro "ordenador" y la destruccion de todos los objetivos estrategicos importantes para frenar el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos y arrebatar el derecho al uso de armas nucleares, razon por la cual se duplica mas la peligrosidad de la situacion creada.
					
					El numero de los bandidos participantes en la presente "operacion especial" bajo la mascara del presente simulacro militar se llega a mas de 3,000 efectivos, tres veces mayor que el ano pasado, incluyendo la unidad Ranger del 75o regimiento de paracaidistas de las fuerzas terrestres, las unidades del combate especial No.1 y 19 (Green Berets), el 353o cuerpo de combate especial de las fuerzas aereas, los grupos No.1, 3, 5 y 7 del primer cuerpo de combate especial de las fuerzas navales, los dos batallones de la primera brigada Stryker de la 25a division de las fuerzas terrestres, un batallon del 66o regimiento blindado y la 31a expedicion naval de la infanteria marina, de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas.
					
					En particular, fueron introducidos hasta los bandidos de  Navy Seal, que se encarga de la "operacion para eliminar la direccion" de la contraparte segun la orden directa del presidente norteamericano, y "Delta Force", perteneciente a la comandancia conjunta de operacion especial que se llama "columna ligera de Casa Blanca". 
					
					Ahora, los imperialistas norteamericanos y los belicistas militares surcoreanos no encubren el hecho de que los ejercicios de la "operacion especial", que se desarrollan en el terreno por esas unidades, tienen como objeto la "operacion de descabezamiento" para "eliminar la direccion del Norte de Corea" y el "golpe preventivo" para aniquilar las bases nucleares y de misiles.
					
					El vocero del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea hizo publica el dia 26 una advertencia revelando que todos los movimientos arriba mencionados tienen el caracter peligrosisimo siendo ultimos esfuerzos de los yanquis y belicistas militares surcoreanos que se cayeron en la crisis de destruccion por el fracaso total de la politica hostil a Corea y la otra de enfrentamiento fratricida.
					
					En relacion con que la situacion creada se llego al punto que ya no se puede cometer ni una negligencia mas, el EMG del EPC advierte a los provocadores como sigue:
					
					Primero. Puesto que se puso clara la intriga de la "operacion especial" de los imperialistas norteamericanos y los belicistas surcoreanos contra la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y fue descubierto hasta su intento del peligrosisimo "golpe preventivo", anunciamos la posicion de nuestro ejercito de aplastar despiadadamente todas las maniobras arriba mencionadas mediante la operacion especial preventiva y la batalla de golpe adelantado al estilo coreano.
					
					Sera una gran equivocacion si los provocadores piensan que la bandidesca "operacion especial" y el "golpe preventivo", que segun ellos fueron fructiferos en otros paises y otras regiones, lograran iguales resultados en esta tierra donde se defiende por el poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu.
					
					Segundo. Tienen que estar presentes siempre de que se emprendera en cualquier tiempo y sin advertencia previa el golpe implacable de nuestro ejercito, mientras que estan emplazados invariablemente en el Sur de Corea y su alrededor los medios operacionales y los efectivos de los Estados Unidos y el Sur de Corea, movilizados en la "operacion especial" y el "golpe preventivo" contra la RPDC.
					
					Nuestro ejercito no estara con brazos cruzados ante los bandidos que tratan de danarnos con armas mortiferas.
					
					Tercero. El inicio de la "operacion especial" y el "golpe preventivo" contra nosotros servira del evento historico que anuncia la destruccion tragica del imperialismo norteamericano y el arruinamiento final de los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Deviene una tragedia secular el hecho de que EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea, enfrentados de siglo a siglo con nosotros, no entienden todavia la absurdidad de sus intentos para atentar la dignidad maxima y la soberania de nuestro pais.
					
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos deben reflexionar de las consecuencias destructivas que se emanaran de sus imprudentes locuras militares.
					
					Nuestro ejercito no dice palabras vanas.
